scripts.build-js-tm: minify timer/js/index.js > timer/js/index.min.js && minify timer/js/clock.js > timer/js/clock.min.js
scripts.build-css-tm: minify timer/css/index.css > timer/css/index.min.css && minify timer/css/clock.css > timer/css/clock.min.css
scripts.build-css: npm run build-css-mn && npm run build-css-ts && npm run build-css-ft && npm run build-css-tm
scripts.build-js: npm run build-js-mn && npm run build-js-ts && npm run build-js-ft && npm run build-js-tm
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
